toolbox_instructions_widget_instruction_: Tab the toolbox to access your tools
custom_about_dialog_text_1: Toolbox is a collection of useful tools that are a must-have on every smartphone. Instead of loads of different small apps I have bundeled them into one super-app, making it a digital swiss army knife!
custom_about_dialog_text_2: If you like my work, please consider buying me a coffee.
calibration_explanation_text_mm: Measure 5 centimeters & tab the save button to calibrate. Drag the edge of the colored box to resize the ruler.
calibration_explanation_text_inch: Measure 2 inches & tab the save button to calibrate. Drag the edge of the colored box to resize the ruler.
no_compass_text: This device does not have a compass...
location_needed_text: We need your location for the compass to display correctly
no_qr_text: Enter a link and tap the button to generate a QR-Code.
